name: @codebase-mcp/prompt-enhance
description: Prompt enhancement desktop application with web UI

scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('src/web/templates')) fs.cpSync('src/web/templates', 'dist/web/templates', {recursive: true})"
scripts.package: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/prompt-enhance-win-x64.exe --config pkg.config.json

author: wmymz <wmymz@icloud.com>
